At MIT, 5.111 is usually taken during the freshman (first) year and  assumes that students have had only one year of high school chemistry. For more information, and all the OCW course materials, visit the full course site (course info is listed in the Syllabus section): https://ocw.mit.edu/5-111F14.
I think the idea is to give students a strong conceptual grounding, makes it easier to fill in nuance later on their own time, instead of leaving half the lecture hall confused.
